name: CHILDREN'S HOSPITAL ASSOCIATION F/K/A NAT'L ASSOCIATION OF CHILDREN'S HOSPITALS
description: Trade association for the nation's children's hospitals
sampleDescriptions:
H.R. 6 - Support for Patients and Communities Act - Issues related to supporting children impacted by the opioid epidemic. 

S. 3120 - Helping to End Addition and LEssen Substance Use Disorders Act - Issues related to supporting children impacted by the opioid epidemic.

S.2597/H.R. 5385 - Children's Hospital Graduate Medical Education Reauthorization Act of 2018 - Support for the reauthorization of federal support for training pediatricians and pediatric specialists. 

S. 428 - The ACE Kids Act of 2017 - Legislation focused on allowing delivery system reform in Medicaid to further progress in offering comprehensive coverage options for children with multiple complex conditions. 

Administration actions regarding the 340(b) program.

H.R. 6 - Support for Patients and Communities Act - Issues related to supporting children impacted by the opioid epidemic through Medicaid and CHIP. 

S. 3120 - Helping to End Addition and Lessen Substance Use Disorders Act - Issues related to supporting children impacted by the opioid epidemic through Medicaid and CHIP.

S. 428 - The ACE Kids Act of 2017 - Legislation focused on allowing delivery system reform in Medicaid to further progress in offering comprehensive coverage options for children with multiple complex conditions.

The ACE Kids Act (H.R. 1226/S. 317)- Issues related to ensuring that the Medicaid program can serve children with multiple chronic conditions and their families to better coordinate and access care that they need.

Issues related to helping military families access the health care coverage and treatment for which they are eligible. 

Issues related to the funding of the Children's Hospital Graduate Medical Education Program

PL 117- 2- The American Rescue Plan Act - Issues related to coverage of children and families during the Covid-19 Pandemic and beyond. Issues related to Medicaid coverage, Behavioral Health and other related issues that allow for quality coverage for children and the providers and hospitals that care for them. 

Issues related to improving the status and availability of behavioral health programs for children in Medicaid and CHIP.

PL 117- 2- The American Rescue Plan Act - Issues related to coverage of children and families during the Covid-19 Pandemic and beyond. Issues related to Medicaid coverage, Behavioral Health and other related issues that allow for quality coverage for children and the providers and hospitals that care for them. 

Issues regarding the funding of the Children's Hospital Graduate Medical education program including the President's budget proposal and Labor/HHS Appropriations bills.

Issues related to improving the status and availability of behavioral health programs for children.

Issues regarding the Administration's distribution of existing Provider Relief Fund dollars and the impact on children's hospitals and related pediatric providers.

Build Back Better Act - Issues related to children's health, CHGME, maternal and child health and Medicaid improvements for children.

Issues related to improving pediatric behavioral health nationally.

Issues related to improving infrastructure in pediatric settings.
